plot: The story of Francis Gary Powers, a U-2 pilot for the CIA who was shot down in his spy plane over Russia, captured and imprisoned.
title: Francis Gary Powers: The True Story of the U-2 Spy Incident
plot_es: The story of Francis Gary Powers, a U-2 pilot for the CIA who was shot down in his spy plane over Russia, captured and imprisoned.
original_name: Francis Gary Powers: The True Story of the U-2 Spy Incident
plot_en: The story of Francis Gary Powers, a U-2 pilot for the CIA who was shot down in his spy plane over Russia, captured and imprisoned.
